lu.softec.maven.mavenizer
Class AbstractMavenizerMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.AbstractMavenizerMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractArchiveMavenizerMojo, AbstractPomMavenizerMojo
public abstract class AbstractMavenizerMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

Base class for Mavenizer mojo providing paramater shared by all mojos.

Field Detail

archiveBaseDir

protected java.io.File archiveBaseDir
Base directory where the archive of the project to be mavenized should be stored. This directory is only used to compute a name for the archive file when no archiveFile parameter has been provided. It should be located in the build directory, or the archive will be considered to be provided locally.

archiveURL

protected java.net.URL archiveURL
URL of the archive of the project to be mavenized. If ommitted, the file is directly expanded from the archiveFile parameter. If the archive file or the archive base directory is not located in the build directory, this URL will be only used for POM documentation.

deleteTargetDirectory

public void deleteTargetDirectory(java.io.File file)
                           throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
Delete a directory from the build directory. If file is null, file does not exist, or the directory is not in the build directory, silently do nothing.

Parameters:
file - directory to be deleted
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - when an I/O error occurs during deletion
